title: The Twelve Spies
summary: Numbers 13 recounts the sending of twelve spies to scout the Promised Land. They return with a good report about the land but most express fear of its inhabitants. Only Caleb and Joshua encourage trust in God.

faq.question: What did the spies report?
faq.answer: The land was fruitful, but ten spies feared the strong inhabitants and giants.

faq.question: Who had faith to enter the land?
